it is flashed with burner max alos..in case you guys wondered... pls help...i will really appriciate it.. :'(

@homdawg , enable all settings in eeprom & clear opc history , then reboot ur pc ( must)
in imgburn uncheck verify box , in writing do check OPC box & burn on 4x speed , disable burn broof , check box Calculate optimum , turn off screen saver or power save in pc , burn & dont touch ur pc till the end of burning
i also want to add important thing do change ur Buffer size to max 512 MB ( in image burn)
